channel.title: Zero Hour | Hyperion | Enjoy
channel.description:
Well, it is time for me to go. This is the final thing I'll do for this community, I might stick around and post for a while, but will eventually leave completely. (Implying at least one person cares). Now lets get to the release.
I started this back in the beginning of October, so it's got some good time on it, I've done a good amount of work to it, and feel some may benefit from my ideas and such. I would enjoy any and all criticism, good or bad.
Some features I've added are:
[ul][li]Eating[/li] [li]Drinking (Potions)[/li] [li]New PvP combat[/li] [li]Door system[/li] [li]Started shop system[/li] [li]Prayers[/li] [li]Started Herblore, and Prayer[/li] [li]Started a minigame system[/li] [li]New packaging, love it or hate it[/li] [li]Various other actions[/li] [li]Equipment bonuses[/li] [li]Equipment requirements[/li] [li]Object updating by region[/li] [li]Attributes (Ryley suggested it)[/li] [li]Item prices[/li] [li]NPC Combat stats[/li] [li]Several more...[/li][/ul]
Now about the programming styles used in this base, they aren't all the same throughout, I tried many different methods all throughout, so if you see a bad piece of code when you first open it, don't expect the rest to be like that. Now for some media so you guys don't freak out. [center] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/Welcome.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/Prayer.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/Potions.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/Potions2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/NPCSpawning.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/EquipmentBonuses.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/Eating.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/BoneBurying.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mX9xdVazSEI[/youtube][/center]
I started work for one fair idea, I would like you to look at the interface I designed for it.
[IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Zero%20Hour/Cityinfo.png[/img]
Basically what this is, is my idea for a government [size=1pt]Inb4RiiPiin"u ned to tak govermnet clazzes : )"[/size]...
All this would mean is that you would have mayors, and such. The president would be the owner, and would have over-all control over the land, so someone doesn't rage and destroy everything. As a regular player, you would be able to purchase artificial land, and have your name posted somewhere or something like that, to show that you have the wealth. You must pay taxes though, if the mayor of that town sets the taxes too high, either a higher authority will take notice, and impeach him, the townspeople will all move out of the town, and the mayor would get no pay and be forced to resign, or the townspeople would overthrow him.. That's just parts of my idea, hope someone does something with it.
Well, I'm done. Here are the links. The client and server are included in this. http://www.mediafire.com/file/16va3kd1v3ymg2s/Zero_Hour_Final.rar
Farewell to all of those who like me, and don't.
